I

image - Variable in class characters.Enemy
The visual representation of the Enemy.
image - Variable in class characters.MainCharacter
A group of Sprites that represents the MainCharacter, facing one of the orthogonal directions.
increaseInVision() - Method in class items.ItemInventory
The sum of vision of the player.
incrementCurWord(char) - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
This method controls addition of letters to the end of the current word.
initAllItems() - Static method in class items.Item
Initializes all Items available in the game.
initDic() - Static method in class frame.GameGraphics
 
initiateBattle() - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
Initializes all variables related to a regular battle.
initiateBossBattle() - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
Initializes all variables related to a boss battle.
initImage() - Static method in class items.SpellInventory
Initializes the regular spell image.
initLetters() - Static method in class items.Item
Initializes an array with all the letters required, and randomizes it.
isPassable() - Method in class mapping.Tile
 
Item - Class in items
Item is the representation of one Item used by the player.
Item(String, Boolean, int, String, int[], int) - Constructor for class items.Item
Creates an Item by taking everything that the Item needs.
itemInventory - Variable in class characters.MainCharacter
The ItemInventory available to the MainCharacter.
ItemInventory - Class in items
ItemInventory is used for storage of all items available to the player.
ItemInventory() - Constructor for class items.ItemInventory
Creates an empty ItemInventory.
items - package items
Contains all classes that logically gain direct access the Item or other features of the player's inventories.
items - Variable in class characters.MainCharacter
The ItemSet available to the MainCharacter.
items - Variable in class items.ItemInventory
All the items available to the player.
items - Variable in class items.ItemSet
The two Items: a weapon and a shield.
ItemSet - Class in items
ItemSet is a combination of a weapon, a shield, and boots as defined in Item.
ItemSet() - Constructor for class items.ItemSet
Creates an empty set of Items, following the two character rule of an ItemSet.
itemsLeft(int) - Static method in class items.Item
The amount of unused Items on this level.
